H0.text: Pollinate is what nectar‑feeding bats do to flowers.

H1.text: Defecate is what nectar‑feeding bats do to flowers.

H2.text: Illumination is what nectar‑feeding bats do to flowers.

H3.text: Consume is what nectar‑feeding bats do to flowers.

A4.text: Chiropterophily or bat pollination is the pollination of flowering plants by bats.

A5.text: In Australia pollination by flying, gliding and earthbound mammals has been demonstrated.
